C3NA Required Package Check

Source: R/miscFunctions.r
C3NAPackageCheck.Rd

Check if required packages are installed and its current version

C3NAPackageCheck()

Examples

C3NAPackageCheck()
#>    Found      Library Version    PackageName
#> 1   TRUE         CRAN   1.4.0        stringr
#> 2   TRUE         CRAN   3.1.6         tibble
